attributes.action: Early/Immediate Declassification and Releease of World War 2 Records
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to petition to have all World War 2 military records made available to the public as soon as possible.

Like many, we have family members, some of which have passed away, that served their country during World War 2, and in understanding more about their lives and experiences we cannot find out what they did in their Military service, where they were posted and when and for how long etc.

This is important family history that we wish to know and pass on to our children so they learn of, and never forget the importance of their ancestors service and sacrifice.
